justification: Misreads Team B’s needs and preferences: B is conservative, seeks stable possession WRs, and needs immediate wins, yet receives a doubtful RB (Alex White) and a volatile rookie WR (David Baker). Calling B’s RB room “awful” is inaccurate (they have a Tier 2 and Tier 3 RB). The offer benefits A’s floor preference by acquiring a low-variance veteran (David Campbell) but doesn’t address B’s mindset. Rationale is brief and not evidence-based.
